content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or emotions, but from research, it is difficult to pinpoint one specific scene as the most challenging for the entire cast. However, some challenging scenes for certain characters include:

- Robert Sheehan, who played Nathan Young, had difficulty filming the scene in which he had to drown in a bathtub.
- Antonia Thomas, who played Alisha Daniels, found it challenging to film the emotional aftermath of the death of her character's friend and fellow Misfit, Simon Bellamy (played by Iwan Rheon).
- Lauren Socha, who played Kelly Bailey, expressed difficulty while filming scenes that required her character to be aggressive and violent.
